name: Vampiric Mind Flayer
languages: telepathy 120 ft. but can only project emotions

traits.Spider Climb: The mind flayer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the mind flayer has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
traits.Unusual Nature: The mind flayer doesn't require air, food, or sleep.
